Apologies for the email sent in error
Dear Parent or Guardian of {!Contact.Name},
We would like to apologise for the incorrect email we sent to you on Thursday 7 January. This stated that your payment for the NCS programme had been cancelled. Please be assured that this email was sent out in error and we have not attempted to process a payment from your account.
If you are concerned, we would advise you to double check your bank statements. Please contact us if there is a problem so we can investigate.
We are very sorry for any confusion and inconvenience this has caused.
If you have any questions or would like to discuss this, please call us on 0203 542 2400 or send us an email to contact@ncsthechallenge.org
Yours sincerely,
Tanya Dunne Head of Customer Services The Challenge (largest provider of NCS)
